name: Mr_Bean's Spell Workshop
short_description:
Mr_Bean's Spell Workshop is a place on HiveWorkshop.com where people who are creating a Warcraft III project can request spells. The user must explain the spell(s) in detail and then a member of the team will work on it, creating it in either GUI or vJASS. Completed requests will be uploaded here.

Links
¯¯¯¯¯
- Completed requests: click the "Files" tab at the top of the page. Select either "GUI Requests" or "vJASS Requests", depending on what you wanted.
- In progress requests: click the "Wiki" tab at the top of the page. Then click "Browse Pages" on the left-hand side of the page.
summary: Project for creating Warcraft 3 spells for people.
